channel.title: short stories Archives - Dustin K. Lowe
channel.description: Books by Author Dustin K. Lowe

image.title: short stories Archives - Dustin K. Lowe

item.title: Tales Older Than Time
item.dc:creator: Dustin
item.description: Read the story of a journalist in France who finds a young woman threatening suicide. Find out what happens during one girl’s adventure at midnight to get help for her injured father. And exactly what sort of creature was observed by a ship full of sailors and their passengers? Each story is set in the Victorian era of the 19th century. These wonderfully vivid and exciting tales will stay with you long after you read them. Experience the eagerly-awaited collection of short stories that seem older than time, written by the creative mind of Dustin K. Lowe. item.content:encoded: Read the story of a journalist in France who finds a young woman threatening suicide. Find out what happens during one girl’s adventure at midnight to get help for her injured father. And exactly what sort of creature was observed by a ship full of sailors and their passengers? Each story is set in the Victorian era of the 19th century. These wonderfully vivid and exciting tales will stay with you long after you read them. Experience the eagerly-awaited collection of short stories that seem older than time, written by the creative mind of Dustin K. Lowe.
